onegpy.operators.localsearch.AbstractLocalSearch¶

class onegpy.operators.localsearch.AbstractLocalSearch(problem, target_node, func_search_type)[source]¶

Abstract class for Local Search

__init__(problem, target_node, func_search_type)[source]¶

Abstract class for local search.

Parameters:
  • problem – problem object. target problem.
  • target_node – String. type of target nodes.
  • func_search_type – String, function name.
